hero.title: Association of Water & Environment
hero.subtitle: Research & Development and Consumer Protection
hero.mission: Dedicated to scientific research on water and environment, sustainable resource management, and consumer protection in the Dakhla-Oued Eddahab region.

pillars.title: Our Core Pillars
pillars.description: We operate at the intersection of environmental preservation, scientific research, and consumer rights advocacy.

consumer.title: Consumer Protection
consumer.desc: Championing consumer rights through education, legal advocacy, and market monitoring.

environment.title: Environmental Care
environment.desc: Tree planting, beach cleanups, and waste management initiatives to protect our ecosystem.

research.title: Research & Development
research.desc: Scientific studies on water scarcity, desalination impact, and sustainable agriculture.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.title: A Sustainable Future for
vision.description: We believe in a holistic approach where environmental protection goes hand in hand with social development. Our projects are designed to create lasting impact, empowering local communities while preserving our precious natural resources.

about.title: Who We Are
about.heroSubtitle: Dedicated to environmental protection and scientific research in Dakhla-Oued Eddahab
about.description1: The Association of Water & Environment for Research & Development and Consumer Protection (AWERDCP) is a non-governmental organization based in Dakhla, Morocco. We are dedicated to the scientific study of water resources, environmental conservation, and the protection of consumer rights.
about.description2: Our mission bridges the gap between scientific research and community action, ensuring a sustainable future for the Dakhla-Oued Eddahab region.
about.obj1: Conduct scientific studies and field research on water and the environment.
about.obj2: Conserve water resources and protect the environment.
about.obj3: Raise consumer awareness regarding product quality, health, and safety.
about.obj4: Guide consumers on food suitability, especially marine products.
about.obj5: Receive and resolve consumer complaints in coordination with authorities.
about.obj6: Publish research findings to guide consumer choices.
about.obj7: Conduct awareness workshops and educational seminars.
about.obj8: Participate in national and international forums on environment protection.
about.obj9: Support government bodies in standards setting and market monitoring.
about.obj10: Build partnerships with public and private entities with shared goals.
about.joinDescription: We welcome partnerships with public and private entities to achieve common environmental goals.
about.presidentDesc: University Professor specializing in water resources.
about.secretaryDesc: Researcher at the National Institute of Fisheries Research (INRH).
about.treasurerDesc: Specialist at the National Institute of Fisheries Research (INRH).
about.vision: Leading the way in environmental stewardship and consumer advocacy.
about.mission: Conducting field research, raising environmental awareness, and protecting consumer health through scientific guidance and community action.

activities.heroSubtitle: Engaging with the community through education, scientific research, and direct field action

act1.title: My Garden – My Responsibility
act1.desc: Environmental awareness workshop targeting school children.

details.description: The association organized an environmental awareness workshop targeting school children.
objectives: Promote environmental awareness among young students
partners: Association Al Rayane for Women's Development
actions: Participation in tree planting inside the school garden

act2.title: Training Workshop for Eco-Schools
act2.desc: Presentation on water stress crisis and management challenges.

details.description: The association delivered a presentation on water stress crisis in Morocco and challenges of water management in Dakhla-Oued Eddahab region.
organizers: Mohammed VI Foundation for Environmental Protection
Regional Academy of Education and Training

act3.title: Integrated Water Management in Facing Water Stress
act3.desc: Scientific conference on water management challenges and solutions.

objectives: Exchange experiences regarding water stress crisis
Discuss water management challenges in the region
Present successful practices in water conservation
keyPoints: Morocco has faced 7 consecutive years of drought
recommendations: Create a regional network of environmental associations
Review pricing and monitoring of water consumption by large companies
Urgent maintenance of drinking water and sanitation infrastructure in Dakhla

act4.title: Conference on Waste Recycling & Field Visit
act4.desc: Conference on recycling importance and field visit to Agadir landfill.

details.description: Organization of a conference on the importance of recycling and a field visit to the controlled landfill in Agadir.
partners: Master’s Students in Geomatics Applied to Natural Resource Management
details.project: Solid waste recycling using Composting technique
composting: Transforms organic waste (food scraps, leaves) into natural fertilizer
Needs aeration, moisture and regular turning

act5.title: Mapping Traditional Foods in the Arab Region
act5.desc: International participation by Dr. Aicha SAAD on traditional food documentation.

details.participant: Dr. Aicha SAAD (President of the Association)
details.presentation: "The Moroccan Experience in Mapping and Documenting Traditional Food"
details.theme: Mapping Traditional Foods in the Arab Region
